messages.content: ComfyUI_Qwen2-Audio-7B-Instruct-Int4 is an implementation of Qwen2-Audio-7B-Instruct-Int4 by ComfyUI that supports text-based queries and audio queries to generate captions or responses.
What types of queries can users submit in ComfyUI_Qwen2-Audio-7B-Instruct-Int4?
Users can submit text-based queries to request information or generate descriptions, and audio queries to analyze content and generate detailed captions or summaries.

Users can install ComfyUI_Qwen2-Audio-7B-Instruct-Int4 from ComfyUI Manager by searching for 'Qwen2' or by downloading or cloning the repository into the 'ComfyUI\custom_nodes\' directory and running 'pip install -r requirements.txt'.
Where will the models be downloaded when running the workflow in ComfyUI_Qwen2-Audio-7B-Instruct-Int4?
The models will be downloaded automatically when running the workflow if they are not found in the 'ComfyUI\models\prompt_generator\' directory.
Can you provide an example of a text-based query in ComfyUI_Qwen2-Audio-7B-Instruct-Int4?
An example of a text-based query in ComfyUI_Qwen2-Audio-7B-Instruct-Int4 could be 'What is the meaning of life?'.
Can you provide an example of an audio query in ComfyUI_Qwen2-Audio-7B-Instruct-Int4?
An example of an audio query in ComfyUI_Qwen2-Audio-7B-Instruct-Int4 could be 'Tell me what you hear in this audio clip.'.
Is there a visual representation of the workflow for text-based and audio queries in ComfyUI_Qwen2-Audio-7B-Instruct-Int4?

Yes, there are visual representations of the workflow for text-based and audio queries. The text-based query workflow is depicted in 'Chat_with_text_workflow.png', and the audio query workflow is depicted in 'Chat_with_audio_workflow.png'.
